Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2017 06:54PM mrsALG wrote: Thanks to everyone for the kind words! I feel better hearing from other people in my situation and that are surviving! I will continue to visit this site for advice and encouragement.
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL

Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2017 08:50PM mrsALG wrote: I was diagnosed with stage II triple positive breast cancer on 10/23/17 but in my pre-chemo PET scan on 11/21/17 and then biopsy they found liver mets. Reading online statistics that people with stage IV with liver mets live less than 5 years, I am really scared now. My first chemo is this Thursday so I know I'm in for a long road but I guess I'm wanting some reassurance that I wasn't just dealt an instant death sentence. Thanks.
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL

Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2017 08:51PM mrsALG wrote: Stefajoy - That's such great news!! Gives me hope! =)
